question: Identify this neckline: <image 1>
description: The image features a woman wearing an elegant wedding dress. The dress has a strapless design with a sweetheart neckline. The bodice is adorned with intricate beadwork and embroidery, adding a touch of sophistication. The dress is form-fitting through the torso and hips, then flares out into a layered, mermaid-style skirt with cascading ruffles. The background includes large windows with a brick wall, suggesting an industrial or loft-like setting.
